data.comment: Today's referee, Jarred Gillett, has blown to start the match.
Dominic Ball (QPR) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at The Den.
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Ilias Chair.
In the minute 53, That's a fine assist from Tom Carroll.
Matt Smith is on a sub for Shaun Williams for Millwall.
Millwall make their second substitution with Ryan Leonard replacing Alex Pearce.
In the minute 64, Jon Dadi BÃ¶dvarsson is replacing Mason Bennett for Millwall at The Den.
Own goal! Tom Carroll scores in his own net to make it 1-1.
The home team replace Troy Parrott with Tom Bradshaw.
In the minute 77, Mark Warburton is making the team's first substitution at The Den with Macauley Bonne replacing Ilias Chair.
George Thomas is replacing Tom Carroll for the away team.
The match has come to a close in London. The final score is 1-1.
Tyler Burey is on a sub for Jed Wallace for Millwall.
Macauley Bonne (QPR) gets a yellow card.
